alert.note: Alert for Rogers; Tulsa; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 2:25AM CDT until July 08 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wagoner County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 224 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bixby, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Bixby... Jenks... Glenpool... Coweta... Catoosa... Verdigris... Inola... Jenks Riverside Airport... Oneta... Leonard... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 231 and 242. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
